name: Webpack
description: Module bundler that compiles and bundles JavaScript files and other assets

name: Babel
description: JavaScript compiler that converts ES6+ code into backward-compatible JavaScript

name: ESLint
description: Linting tool for identifying and fixing problematic patterns in JavaScript code

name: Sass
description: CSS preprocessor that extends CSS with variables, nested rules, and more

name: Jest
description: JavaScript testing framework used for writing and running unit tests
